subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brett Gardner stole what appeared to be a two-run homer in the 11th from Yadier Molina, and the Yankees broke open a tie game with three runs in the 12th.
snippet: Brett Gardner stole what appeared to be a two-run homer in the 11th from Yadier Molina, and the Yankees broke open a tie game with three runs in the 12th.
